name: Générer des publications LinkedIn à partir de pages Web avec GPT-4 et révision humaine
description:
## Cas d'utilisation
Transformez n'importe quelle page Web en une publication LinkedIn convaincante — complète avec une image générée par IA. Cette automatisation est idéale pour partager du contenu tel que des articles de blog, des études de cas ou des mises à jour de produits dans un format poli et engageant.

## Ce que fait cette automatisation
Étant donné une URL de page et des instructions utilisateur optionnelles, cette automatisation :
- Récupère le contenu de la page Web
- Utilise l'IA pour rédiger une publication claire, éducative et optimisée pour LinkedIn
- Envoie le tout à Slack pour révision et approbation
- Gère les retours et révisions via des interactions Slack

Entrée :
- **URL de la page** — Le lien vers la page Web (obligatoire)
- **Instructions** — Notes optionnelles sur le ton, l'accent ou le format

Sortie :
- Texte de la publication LinkedIn
- Message Slack avec options de révision/approbation

## Comment ça fonctionne
1. **Soumission du formulaire** : L'utilisateur saisit une page Web et des instructions optionnelles.
2. **Récupération de contenu Web** : Utilise Airtop pour extraire le contenu de la page.
3. **Génération de publication** : L'agent IA rédige une publication basée sur la page et les instructions.
4. **Flux de révision Slack** :
   - Publication et image envoyées à Slack pour retour
   - L'utilisateur peut approuver, demander des révisions ou décliner
   - Les révisions déclenchent automatiquement des étapes de re-traitement
5. **Livraison de la publication finale** : La publication approuvée est renvoyée à Slack, prête à être publiée.

## Exigences de configuration
1. Générez une [clé API Airtop](https://portal.airtop.ai/api-keys) complètement gratuite.
2. Configurez vos [identifiants OpenAI](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/openai/) pour la génération de prompts de publication et d'image
3. Identifiants [Slack OAuth](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/slack/#slack-trigger-configuration) et un canal Slack

## Prochaines étapes
- **Publier directement** : Ajoutez la publication LinkedIn pour automatiser l'ensemble du flux de contenu.
- **Variations de modèle** : Proposez des préréglages de style de publication (par exemple, technique, narratif, format court).
- **Synchronisation CRM** : Enregistrez les publications approuvées et les statistiques dans Airtable ou Notion pour une utilisation par l'équipe.

En savoir plus sur [la génération de contenu social à l'aide de l'IA](https://www.airtop.ai/automations/generate-linkedin-post-from-a-webpage)

workflow.name: Generate LinkedIn Post from Web Page - text only

parameters.formDescription: Fill out these fields and you'll have a full LinkedIn post ready to go in a minute.

parameters.content: # To generate post and visual - start here!

categories.description: The email has been reviewed, but the human requests modifications to the post text before it is sent like tweaks, removing parts, rewording, etc. This could include suggested edits, rewording, or major revisions to the post text. |Example phrases include:"Can we tweak this part of the post?""Needs some changes to this sentence.""I’d like to reword the post.""Not quite right—let’s revise the text.""Can you adjust the text before sending?""Don't mention Make in the text""change the style of the writing""tone of voice is not consistent with our branding"

The email has been reviewed and accepted as-is. The human explicitly or implicitly expresses approval, indicating that no changes are needed. |Example phrases include:"Looks good.""Go ahead and send it.""This works for me.""Approved.""No changes needed.""ok"
The email has been reviewed, but the human requests not to proceed with the post. |Example phrases include:"Let's cancel this post.""Don't post"

parameters.content:
README
# Generate LinkedIn Posts from Any Webpage (text only)
## Use Case
Turn any web page into a compelling LinkedIn post — complete with an AI-generated image. This automation is ideal for sharing content like blog posts, case studies, or product updates in a polished and engaging format.

## What This Automation Does
Given a page URL and optional user instructions, this automation:
- Scrapes the content of the webpage
- Uses AI to write a clear, educational, and LinkedIn-optimized post
- Sends both to Slack for review and approval
- Handles feedback and revisions via Slack interactions

Input:
- **Page URL** — The link to the webpage (required)
- **Instructions** — Optional notes on tone, emphasis, or format

Output:
- LinkedIn post text
- Slack message with review/approval options

## How It Works
1. **Form Submission**: User inputs a web page and optional instructions.
2. **Web Scraping**: Uses Airtop to extract page content.
3. **Post Generation**: AI agent writes a post based on the page and instructions.
4. **Slack Review Flow**:
   - Post and image sent to Slack for feedback
   - User can approve, request revisions, or decline
   - Revisions trigger reprocessing steps automatically
5. **Final Post Delivery**: Approved post is sent back to Slack, ready to publish.

## Setup Requirements
1. Airtop API key
2. OpenAI credentials for post and image prompt generation
3. Slack OAuth integration with a review channel
4. A sub-workflow for branded image generation

## Next Steps
- **Post Directly**: Add LinkedIn publishing to automate the full content workflow.
- **Template Variations**: Offer post style presets (e.g., technical, story-driven, short-form).
- **CRM Sync**: Save approved posts and stats in Airtable or Notion for team use.

json.Post:
Turning any webpage into a LinkedIn-ready post—complete with eye-catching visuals—can take hours, or it can take just a few clicks.

Content teams know the pain: endless copy-paste, screenshotting, image edits, and chasing down approvals. Even LinkedIn’s native sharing barely scratches the surface if you want something on-brand and polished.

That’s why we built the “Generate LinkedIn Post and Image from a Webpage” automation with n8n and Airtop.

Just drop in any URL (even ones behind a login), add quick posting instructions, and let the workflow do the rest:
⚙️ Advanced web scraping pulls the right content through real-browser sessions.
⚙️ AI generates concise, professional LinkedIn copy—and prompts a branded image to match.
⚙️ Everything routes straight to a designated Slack channel for instant feedback and approvals.
⚙️ Once you give the green light, your post (plus the image and all structured data) is ready to publish on LinkedIn.

Result? No more manual formatting, no more back-and-forth corrections. Teams can now scale up their LinkedIn content—whether it’s thought leadership, product updates, or event recaps—with consistency and speed.

Curious how it fits your workflow? Try it out for free or set up a demo. What’s the biggest bottleneck in your LinkedIn publishing process right now?

user.name: Airtop
user.bio: Airtop provides an intelligent browser automation API for AI agents, enabling seamless web interaction, including login, navigation, and data extraction from any site, even those with complex authentication - all with  natural language instructions.In simple terms, we allow you to automate anything humans can do online, on any site with just words
